original: de'i rjes la phyag 'tshal ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: de'i rjes la phyag 'tshal ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: After that, having gone for refuge to the Three Jewels, confessed one‚Äôs sins, rejoiced in merit, made a dedication, and generated the spirit of enlightenment,üîΩone should recite:

original: bdag sdig thams cad so sor bshags //
analyzed: bdag sdig thams cad so sor bshags //

original: skye dgu'i bsong nams la rjes rang //
analyzed: skye dgu'i bsong nams la rjes rang //

original: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //

original: zhes bya ba 'di lan gsum du gdon no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di lan gsum du gdon no //

original: de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms la /

original: de byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags brjod par bya ste /

translated: The seed syllable is on the moon, and its light rays illuminate the world as before.

original: rmi lam mam dngos su yang rung ste /
